text: Plana Baixa () is a comarca in the province of Castellón, Valencian Community, Spain. The main source of water for irrigation in the area is the Millars River. == Municipalities == The comarca is composed of 20 municipalities, listed below with their populations at the 2001 and 2011 Censuses, and according to the latest official estimates: {| class="wikitable sortable" !
